response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its suitability for your requirements. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 9500}
